analyzed: sa paccaya duka ādi kusala ttika

original: Sappaccayaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naappaccayo nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: sappaccayam kusalam dhammam paṭicca na appaccayaḥ na kusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā ekam pe avigate eka

original: Sappaccayaṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naappaccayo naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: sappaccayam akusalam dhammam paṭicca na appaccayaḥ na akusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā ekam pe avigate eka

original: Sappaccayaṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paccayā naappaccayo naabyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ sappaccayasadisaṁ.)
analyzed: sappaccayam abyākatam dhammam paccayā na appaccayaḥ na abyākataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā ekam pe avigate eka saṅkhittam sappaccaya sadisa
